abs_plot_module¶

abs_plot_module.draw_abs_figure()¶

Makes a flux vs velocity graph, that also has the error vs velocity on the same graph. Has text that identifies what the graph number is, what the spectra name is, the signal to noise ratio, and the redshift value used.

Parameters

  • kind (list[int]) – redshift

  • kind – wavelength

Returns

velocity

Return type

array[int]

Previous topic

abs_function_module
